inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: routine use for past three months

exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: no mention of skeletal deformity or assistive devices

exclusion.criterion: previous surgeries at back and/or lower limbs
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has history of acne, mild hirsutism, elevated testosterone levels, gradual enlargement of hands and feet, irregular menstrual cycle, nipple discharge, snoring, headache, facial features of acromegaly, prognathism. Laboratory evaluation reveals IGF-1 of 968 ng/mL and random GH of 19.7 ng/mL. MRI shows macroadenoma with no invasion.
